name: CATACOMBS: The Beginning
description:
Catacombs: The Beginning - is an excellent 3D shooter where you have to survive in the catacombs overfull of various monsters.
The idea of the game concludes in doing different locations, murders of the monsters and searching for necessary items. To fight against enemies, you are seeking ammunition, gun that is very little of it. But that's why the game is really hard core. At the the same time the game is a simple shooter with dynamic gameplay and pixel graphics. Explore the rooms, look for keys, save patrons, kill monsters. You will definitely love it! Go ahead!

KEY Features:

- The simplest gameplay.
- Pixel graphics.
- Large and various locations.
- Incredible atmosphere.
- Cool impressions from the game.
